name: Shell Spirax S3 GD 80W
description: High Performance Manual Transmission and Gear Oil for Mercedes, Eaton and Isuzu.

globalDocs.name: Spirax S3 GD 80W EN TDG V1.0 25-Nov-2020

localDocs.name: Spirax S3 GD 80W United States EN 140002686046 EHS V1.1 17-FEB-2023

marketing: Shell Spirax S3 GD 80W is a long-life gearbox oil designed to give new benefits based on improved levels of performance to meet the future requirements of gearboxes. Specially optimised mineral base oils and new additive technology improve lubrication of the drive train and potentially extend oil drain intervals. High performance manual transmission and gear oil for Mercedes, Eaton and Isuzu.
